name: magn_spawn_02
text: Let them try and stop me.

text: My horn is sharp, my pike is sharper still.

text: Keep your eye on my horn!

name: magn_begin_01
text: Horn calls to horn and it begins!

name: magn_firstblood_01
text: Ah, first blood, and so much more shall soon be spilled!

name: magn_levelup_02
text: Ah, my strength knows no bounds.

name: magn_kill_01
text: Ha ha ha ha! What did you expect?
text_simple: ha ha ha ha what did you expect

name: magn_kill_05
text: I think you got the point.
text_simple: i think you got the point

name: magn_kill_06
text: Accustom yourself to loss. It suits you.
text_simple: accustom yourself to loss it suits you

name: magn_kill_07
text: Ah, trampled! Ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ah trampled ha ha ha ha

name: magn_kill_08
text: The horn that gored you was precious beyond all measure.
text_simple: the horn that gored you was precious beyond all measure

name: magn_kill_09
text: I faced down a volcano. What made you think you stood a chance?
text_simple: i faced down a volcano what made you think you stood a chance

name: magn_kill_11
text: Answer me, eh. Was it worth your life to try for my horn?
text_simple: answer me eh was it worth your life to try for my horn

name: magn_kill_12
text: You must have mistaken my purpose...to flatten you!
text_simple: you must have mistaken my purpose to flatten you

name: magn_kill_13
text: Ha ha! Tip of the horn to you!
text_simple: ha ha tip of the horn to you

name: magn_kill_14
text: Yeah, ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: yeah ha ha ha ha ha

name: magn_kill_15
text: Ah, ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ah ha ha ha ha ha

name: magn_rival_01
text: What do you mean, I'm not your type?
text_simple: what do you mean im not your type

name: magn_rival_02
text: I do have a gentler side, Enchantress.
text_simple: i do have a gentler side enchantress

name: magn_rival_03
text: Was it something I said, Enchantress?
text_simple: was it something i said enchantress

name: magn_rival_05
text: Is it too late to court?
text_simple: is it too late to court

name: magn_rival_06
text: Hm, that was one fiery wench.
text_simple: hm that was one fiery wench

name: magn_rival_08
text: Too chilly for my tastes, maiden.
text_simple: too chilly for my tastes maiden

name: magn_rival_09
text: I prefer the talkative types, Ranger.
text_simple: i prefer the talkative types ranger

name: magn_rival_10
text: Spirit, you could use more meat on your bones.
text_simple: spirit you could use more meat on your bones

name: magn_rival_11
text: I am sorry I hurt you, creature. But not your rider.
text_simple: i am sorry i hurt you creature but not your rider

name: magn_rival_13
text: The true rogue knight would not so easily fall.
text_simple: the true rogue knight would not so easily fall

name: magn_rival_14
text: Only I shall shake the earth from now on.
text_simple: only i shall shake the earth from now on

name: magn_rival_15
text: You call yourself a master of beasts? I think not.
text_simple: you call yourself a master of beasts i think not

name: magn_rival_16
text: You're no match for me, Tidehunter!
text_simple: youre no match for me tidehunter

name: magn_rival_17
text: You planted your roots in the wrong path.
text_simple: you planted your roots in the wrong path

name: magn_rival_18
text: Too many legs make for a messy gait.
text_simple: too many legs make for a messy gait

name: magn_rival_19
text: I'll not be cowed by any fish.
text_simple: ill not be cowed by any fish

name: magn_rival_20
text: You're no match for me, fishfingers!
text_simple: youre no match for me fishfingers

name: magn_rival_21
text: You're no match for me, fishstick!
text_simple: youre no match for me fishstick

name: magn_rival_22
text: I have tartar sauce for people like you.
text_simple: i have tartar sauce for people like you

name: magn_ally_01
text: Let us trample them together, Spirit Breaker!
text_simple: let us trample them together spirit breaker

name: magn_ally_02
text: I could show you the meaning of pain, oh Queen.

name: magn_ally_03
text: Why are all the good ones dead, Death Prophet?

text: Stick with me, Leshrac, and we'll go far.

text: I'll repay you when I can.
text_simple: ill repay you when i can

name: magn_lasthit_09
text: Beg my pardon and my pike!
text_simple: beg my pardon and my pike

name: magn_death_03
text: Pick on someone your own size.
text_simple: pick on someone your own size

name: magn_death_04
text: Have I finally met my match?
text_simple: have i finally met my match

name: magn_death_06
text: I survived an eruption but died to this?
text_simple: i survived an eruption but died to this

name: magn_death_10
text: My lost kin wait for me.
text_simple: my lost kin wait for me

name: magn_death_11
text: You'll die on this horn next time.
text_simple: youll die on this horn next time

name: magn_death_14
text: Touch my horn and be cursed.
text_simple: touch my horn and be cursed

name: magn_respawn_01
text: They can hurt my body but not my pride.
text_simple: they can hurt my body but not my pride

name: magn_respawn_02
text: I am magnanimous to a point.
text_simple: i am magnanimous to a point

name: magn_respawn_05
text: I won't go so easy on them this time.
text_simple: i wont go so easy on them this time

name: magn_respawn_06
text: I have failed you once but not again.
text_simple: i have failed you once but not again

name: magn_respawn_09
text: Give me a moment to polish my horn.
text_simple: give me a moment to polish my horn

name: magn_respawn_10
text: It will take more than death to discourage me.
text_simple: it will take more than death to discourage me

name: magn_respawn_12
text: Set me against the enemy once more.
text_simple: set me against the enemy once more

name: magn_rare_01
text: Whosoever brought the fires of Mt. Joerlak down upon my kin, know this: You are craven. I shall track you down, and once I do, you shall die upon my horn. Slowly.
text_simple: whosoever brought the fires of mt joerlak down upon my kin know this you are craven i shall track you down and once i do you shall die upon my horn slowly

name: magn_rare_02
text: I have long since lost count of however many fools and weaklings I have slain by pike, by horn, or by hoof. Though let me assure you: The process never ceases to be entertaining.
text_simple: i have long since lost count of however many fools and weaklings i have slain by pike by horn or by hoof though let me assure you the process never ceases to be entertaining

name: magn_rare_04
text: No, I blame no one who covets my horn. But to desire more than sight of it is a guarantee of death.
text_simple: no i blame no one who covets my horn but to desire more than sight of it is a guarantee of death

name: magn_rare_05
text: I tell you what. You touch my horn, I break your face.
text_simple: i tell you what you touch my horn i break your face

text: Twas costly but not compared to the value of my horn.
